name: Forest Runner (Alex Steiner)
description:
The Game Concept:

Dive in a new experience! Forest Runner, multiplayer co-runner game,  compite with other and break records!

Team up with a stranger and try to move on trough the platforms, but puy attention to the dark line which will do everything to prevent you to move on!

How To Play:
  • Use A or Left Arrow to move to the left
  • Use D or Right Arrow to move to the righ
  • Use Space Bar to jump
  • Use E to clim

Note: this game was made by a 14 years old with Unity and C# using photon pun 2

Enjoy!
